/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene and enhancing the colors of the buildings and cars.
